title: Monoprint, "Portrait of a Woman, Looking Left", before 1880
markings:
Red sealing wax with embossed shield lower right holding gray paper to tan support
Lower left recto: Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Cooper Union) [Lugt 457d noir]
Lower right verso: Cooper Union Museum New York [Lugt 457 e]
inscribed:
In graphite lower left on gray paper: (2)
on tan paper lower left in brown ink: Presented by Mrs. William M. chase, 1918
dimensions:
image: 30.4 x 22.5 cm (11 15/16 x 8 7/8 in.)
Overall (gray Japanese paper): 30.4 x 22.5 cm (11 15/16 x 8 7/8 in.)
Overall (2nd support-tan laid paper): 42 x 29.6 cm (16 9/16 x 11 5/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William M. Chase
description: Portrait of a girl with long unbound hair looking left. Textured background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Monoprint, "Portrait of a Woman, Looking Left", before 1880.
before 1880. Dark brown gray ink. Gift of Mrs. William M. Chase. 1918-4-2.
